title.narrative: Strengthening Advocacy and Civic Engagement Project (SACE)

description.narrative: (Nigeria): The Strengthening Advocacy and Civic Engagement (SACE) activity builds the civil society organizations (CSO) capacity to influence key democratic reforms. SACE supports CSOs advocating for improved service delivery in key social sectors such as health, education, and agriculture, while also promoting the rights of women, youth, and persons with disabilities. The activity utilizes local leadership and innovation in its approach to increase citizen participation in democratic processes and promote transparency and accountability in governance. It will mentor 17 issue-based CSO clusters (groupings of CSOs with similar advocacy goals) in advocacy, monitoring, and evaluation. Partners' increased capacity and improved advocacy skills are expected to result in better governance, more inclusive economic growth, and improved policies, especially for vulnerable populations.
